thread.title: Drunk student spends £130 on tickets to see Sean Paul
thread.title_full: Drunk student spends £130 on tickets to see Sean Paul

title: Drunk student spends £130 on tickets to see Sean Paul
text: Share this article Share 'I'm a huge Sean Paul fan I have to say, so I think it must have been in my subconscious. 'I have done stuff like this before but never quite to this extent; I took a gap year and used my works bonus to book a solo trip to Finland. The Sean Paul (pictured) fanatic only remembered when she was locked out of her student accommodation and noticed she'd tweeted about going to see the artist in Copenhagen 'I spent three days just going round art galleries on my own. But this was ridiculous I just don't know why I did it. 'I'd literally been watching documentaries about Copenhagen and deciding what I was going to do and looking at places to say, it was such a shock when the tickets arrived and were for Milan. 'I'm in two minds about whether to go. My parents say they'll help me out with flights because my birthday is coming up but I'm not sure how much I actually need to go. 'The only reason I can think I chose Milan is a friend used to live near there and it often comes up when i'm checking cheap flights on Skyscanner, so I like to think I was being sensible even when drunk. 'Luckily I have a very kind and tolerant boyfriend who will come with me, but even he was a bit like "come on, why have you done this".' Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
